docs.text: general notes what is currently working? use mkdocs to generate static HTML pages use requirements.txt to enable extensions mkdocs is triggered by github actions, then pushed to gh-pages branch push event notifies a webhook that pulls for deployment on primary hosting gh actions are taken from fork for security reasons questions can this setup git-lfs? does plesk really need an SSH key? not if you use HTTPS to clone
docs.title: general notes

docs.text: use mkdocs to generate static HTML pages use requirements.txt to enable extensions mkdocs is triggered by github actions, then pushed to gh-pages branch push event notifies a webhook that pulls for deployment on primary hosting gh actions are taken from fork for security reasons
